user.title: Eyedro Configuration
user.description: Enter the IP address and port of your Eyedro device. The device must be accessible on your local network.

data_description.host: The IP address of your Eyedro device (e.g., 192.168.2.66)
data_description.port: The port number for the API (default: 8080)
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the device for updates (default: 10 seconds, range: 5-300)

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Eyedro device. Please check the IP address and port, and ensure the device is powered on and connected to your network.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid response from Eyedro device. Please verify the device is responding correctly.
error.invalid_ip: Invalid IP address format. Please enter a valid IPv4 address (e.g., 192.168.2.66).
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Eyedro device is already configured.
